timeline.message:
SO-4095: Add easily accessible alternative terms to concept results...

...in ConceptSearchRequest by default
SO-4095: Add first cut of ConceptSuggestionRequest

SO-4095: Update ConceptSuggestionRequest implementation

- Get all tokens using SearchResourceRequestIterator
- Use only the original inclusion as the exclusion for the second search
request
- Limit and searchAfter now controls the second search
SO-4095: Fix typo, exclusions, token selection in suggestion request
SO-4095: Remove unused method from SnomedConceptSearchRequestBuilder
SO-4095: Fix spurious param javadoc tag

timeline.author: cmark

SO-4095: Use MIN_TERM_MATCH as option key and request parameter...

...across search request evaluator implementations
